summary: The diff appears to implement the requested UI changes on PreMeditationPage (moving “More Details”, enlarging slider areas, restyling play/pause) and adds new CSS utilities for sliders and the play/pause button, but it also includes additional global/theming and layout changes not explicitly requested. One REQ-7 acceptance criterion (“standard slider inputs”) cannot be confirmed and appears potentially violated due to use of the app’s Slider component.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the active phase, both volume and seek/time controls must remain standard slider inputs (no replacement with non-standard slider components), while increasing container size/padding.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows PreMeditationPage using an imported Slider component (likely a custom/Radix slider) rather than a native/standard <input type="range"> slider, so the 'standard slider inputs' criterion is not evidenced and may be unmet.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions 'larger slider containers' but does not indicate native input sliders)
